# Sample ipset for local LAN to hit the web server
# Must be done as root.

# Command line
ipset create web hash:net,port
ipset add web 192.168.1.0/24,http
ipset add web 192.168.1.0/24,https

# For a file, generated by ipset save
create web hash:net,port family inet hashsize 1024 maxelem 65536
add web 192.168.1.0/24,tcp:443
add web 192.168.1.0/24,tcp:80
